turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Indian CSICOP.
turn.1: What is the meaning of Indian CSICOP?
turn.2: Indian CSICOP Indian CSICOP is a well-known rationalist group based at Podanur, Tamil Nadu, India.
turn.5: What is the purpose of the foundation?
turn.6: Indian CSICOP is in the forefront of the rationalist campaigns in India which attempt to expose perceived miracles and to eradicate superstitions.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: Indian CSICOP is an affiliate of the US-based skeptical group CSICOP and it publishes "Indian Skeptic", a rationalist periodical.
turn.9: Is it affiliated with any other organizations?
turn.10: It is also affiliated to the Federation of Indian Rationalist Associations, which is an apex body of about 65 rationalist, atheist and organizations aimed at popularization of science among laypersons.
turn.11: Is it a member of any other organizations?
turn.12: It is an associate member of International Humanist and Ethical Union based in London.
